title: Wiwo
author: Wiwo
created_time: October 05, 2023, 08:41:08 AMLast edit: January 26, 2025, 10:52:00 PM by Wiwo
content: Dis thread na our reference thread for the weekly Akawo wey the people wey their names dey for code below involve. The reason we carry de matter come here na make we other brothers for know who and who dey involve for the Akawo.Note:Incase anybody wan join, make you send any person wey their name dey for code pm. Most times dis thread go dey locked, no vex because the thread no be for discussion. If you wan know how e dey work you fit pm Op  Good luck to us, we go dey drop weekly updateCode:IgebotzAdbitcoFivestar4everMVPWiwoKingsDenAgbeCooperative police/ disciplinary committee (head)1: Igebotz2: KingsDenFirst round ‚úÖKick off date: ¬†13th October 2023 to 19th-11-2023Week 1: Fivestar4everMVPWeek 2: IgebotzWeek 3: AdbitcoWeek 4: KingsDenWeek 5: WiwoWeek 6: ¬†AgbeSecond round:üîõ¬†Week 1: Fivestar4everMVPWeek 2: IgebotzWeek 3: AdbitcoWeek 4: KingsDenWeek 5: WiwoWeek 6: Agbe. 14-02-2024Round 3Current round collection listAbbiticoIgebotzProf Agbe‚Å© wiwo Asiska02‚Å®Round 4 24-03-2024 ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† wiwoAsiska02‚Å®IgebotzRound 5 ending on 5th-04-2024IgebotzwiwoAgbeAsiska02‚Å®Round 6 15-09-2024Wiwo AgbeIgebotzKingsDen

comments.body: PAYMENT LOG AS RECIEVED..Payment received from Wiwo - order ID - 256306219263131648.Payment received from Agbe - order ID - 256308476549947392Payment don land from Adbitco - order ID - 256311409855782914Payment received from Igehh - order ID - 256672305191329792Payment received from KingsDen - order ID - 256680944426409986I acknowledge that I have received complete payment from all members of this cooperative.Thank you all.We move.

comments.author: Onyeeze
comments.body: Let this contribution should not cause problem or raise any harm, because it will reach at a time when some people will start given excuses of making their own contribution when they have already received, my suggestion is that when you are selecting that will be involve in this act we should look very well and select credible people that will respond and comply without given an excuse to contribute.Do you have any bylaws that guide you guys concerning anyone who fails to comply? What is the necessary conditions that will be given someone who delay to comply? I think you people suppose to outline conditions before joining the contribution or does you people have a place where you discuss the rotation of the contribution and the conditions

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Onyeeze on October 13, 2023, 11:05:59 AMDo you have any bylaws that guide you guys concerning anyone who fails to comply? What is the necessary conditions that will be given someone who delay to comply? I think you people suppose to outline conditions before joining the contribution or does you people have a place where you discuss the rotation of the contribution and the conditions Well, to answer you, everything is well structured, and yes, we have a place where all members meet and discuss, yes again to your enquiry about rules, we have rules already down for every one of us to follow, but the most important thing to note is that, anyone who failed to comply to the payment after maybe he or she have received payments from other members will be tagged by DT, and that user's account will be completely destroyed, this is why we only accept high ranking members to join, and only accept low rank if a member with high rank decide to stand as a shorty for the low rank user.With the above, I believe you should now have an idea of how structured the group is, rest assured only trusted people are accepted or invited, people we trust not to fail or drag us back in any way or form.

comments.author: Onyeeze
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 13, 2023, 11:24:15 AMQuote from: Onyeeze on October 13, 2023, 11:05:59 AMDo you have any bylaws that guide you guys concerning anyone who fails to comply? What is the necessary conditions that will be given someone who delay to comply? I think you people suppose to outline conditions before joining the contribution or does you people have a place where you discuss the rotation of the contribution and the conditions Well, to answer you, everything is well structured, and yes, we have a place where all members meet and discuss, yes again to your enquiry about rules, we have rules already down for every one of us to follow, but the most important thing to note is that, anyone who failed to comply to the payment after maybe he or she have received payments from other members will be tagged by DT, and that user's account will be completely destroyed, this is why we only accept high ranking members to join, and only accept low rank if a member with high rank decide to stand as a shorty for the low rank user.Since you guys have a rules somewhere else, I think is good but your rules supposed to make open or why it's hidden is because you guys chose strictly the person that will be part of you base on credibility. For the low ranks, I think they are not supposed to be part of this contribution as you said, I like such idea. You made mentioned of DT members to tag someone who who did not meet up the deadline for he or her contribution, did you in any way reference your conditions being discussed outside this thread in forum to justify or prosecute anyone who fails, or the payment will be used as evidence. Secondly, if someone paid to two or three persons out of six contributors, and the person have yet payment from anyone from the platform and it decided to quit from the contribution, will you guys seized the one he or she contributed..how are you guys going to do the person base on the one the person contributed..because this contribution, the moving forward of this contribution lies on campaign, and any campaign can be pause on the process.

comments.body: Sorry¬† to ask oo but wetin be Akawo

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: promise444c5 on October 13, 2023, 11:49:31 AMSorry¬† to ask oo but wetin be Akawo To be contributing money at every specific period of time consecutively and giving it all each time to one of you people (the contributors). I think what is very similar to it in English is cooperative.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.created_time: October 13, 2023, 12:21:16 PMLast edit: October 13, 2023, 12:49:03 PM by Wiwo
comments.body: Onyeeze and promise444c5, please for the sake of next time, ¬†none members comments on this thread is not welcomed to avoid spam and posting to meet signature quota, ¬†and that is the reason why we stated clearly on the ops that if you have any questions you can PM any of the members, ¬†and also mentioned in the ops that this is not a discussion thread. The reason we created this thread is for our member's update, and if your account qualifies to join, ¬†and you can prove to us that you have other sources of income in real life, ¬†that is the only criteria to admit you. Also, we have carefully selected the members, to avoid defaulting and we implemented our forum guide properly.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.created_time: November 13, 2023, 01:12:15 AMLast edit: November 16, 2023, 10:20:25 AM by Wiwo
comments.body: Thank you all guys, I have received the payment from members, just one payment pending due to the current memopool congestion. But we are 100% going well and we are in the last week of this round, ¬†thanks guys once again let's keep it up. Updated 100% of payments received from all members!

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.created_time: November 17, 2023, 05:56:01 AMLast edit: November 17, 2023, 08:13:12 PM by Wiwo
comments.body: With excitement to see that we made it to the final stage of this round of the Akawo, ¬†and I must say that I am impressed with the performance pf everyone involved, ¬†and to that extent I will like to say a big thank you to all the members involved. Thanks for making this easy for all of us and indeed we all have seen the positive impact of this AKAWO, ¬†so let keep it going. To potential new members looking forward to join the movement, ¬†be on the look out for in the next 48 hours the committee will decide whether to open new positions or continue with our current capacity. Payment for this week 6:Code:Agbe

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Payment received from all the participants. Thank you all

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Guys sorry this update is coming late,¬† I have been busy in real life,¬† but here we are,¬† I would like to welcome every member to the official first week of the second round of the Akawo. We decided to continue in our previous capacity as regards to members, and also follow the same collection formula however this may change after this round. Week: 1Member collecting: Fivestar4everMVPPayment:¬† 24th-26th max
